urls.title: North East fire risk waste site closed down
urls.description: The Environment Agency has blocked access to land in Birtley to reduce the serious risks of illegal waste storage to the environment and local community.

text:
The Environment Agency, working with @Tyne_Wear_FRS, has secured a court order to block access to land at Birtley. 

It’s to reduce the serious risks to the environment and local community after waste stored there became a fire risk. 

Read more: https://t.co/eFW65rPMv0 https://t.co/SQfPs9FRx9
